context.title: The Model Tree
context.description: The Model Tree displays all ArchiMate models.

context.title: The Outline Window
context.description: The Outline window acts as a miniature viewport onto the selected diagram View in order to aid in navigation if the diagram is too large to fit in the window.

context.title: The Navigator Window
context.description: The Navigator window displays the currently selected model element and all of its relationships with other elements.

context.title: The Visualiser Window
context.description: The Visualiser window displays the currently selected model element and all of its relationships with other elements in a diagrammatic layout.

context.title: Hints Window
context.description: The Hints window shows a hint for the selected element or palette entry. It can be useful to provide basic information about the purpose of the elements and relationships in a model.

context.title: Canvas Editor
context.description: Creating Canvasses with the Canvas Modelling Toolkit

context.title: The Validator
context.description: The Validator provides hints and tips to improve your model.

context.title: Diagram View
context.description: The elements and relationships that constitute an ArchiMate model as represented in the Model Tree can be arranged into one or more "Views" or visual diagrams.

context.title: Sketch View
context.description: The Sketch View offers a quick way to capture a model.

context.title: Element Properties
context.description: Edit Element Properties.

context.title: Folder Properties
context.description: Edit Folder Properties.

context.title: View Properties
context.description: Edit View Properties.

context.title: Model Properties
context.description: Edit Model Properties.

context.title: Model Relations
context.description: A table showing the Relationships (if any) to and from the selected element in the model. Double-clicking on an entry in the table will select the element in the Model Tree window if it is open.

context.title: Used in Views
context.description: A table showing the Views (if any) where the selected element is used (displayed in a diagram). Double-clicking on an entry in the table will open the View and select the element in the diagram.

context.title: Figure Type
context.description: Choose the figure to represent this Element.

context.title: The Palette
context.description: The Palette is used for creating and selecting.

context.title: Canvas Preferences
context.description: Edit the Canvas Modelling Toolkit Preferences.

context.title: Connections Preferences
context.description: Edit the Connections Preferences.

context.title: Colours and Fonts Preferences
context.description: Edit the application colours

context.title: Diagram Preferences
context.description: Edit the Diagram Preferences.

context.title: General Preferences
context.description: Edit the General Preferences.

context.title: Jasper Reports Preferences
context.description: Edit the Jasper Reports Preferences.

context.title: Validator Preferences
context.description: Edit the Validator Preferences.

context.title: User Properties
context.description: Edit User Properties

context.description: Add a new Nested Element Relationship.
